definition: structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: Stubborn smiled, said, rarely going at once, to accompany her.
sentences.chinese: 倔強的笑着，說，難得去一次，好好陪她啊。

sentences.english: I highly be pleottomd concerning the preceding manwis precious precise exercise.
sentences.chinese: 我高度賞玩後面那私人難得的切確演練。

sentences.english: The business analyst is probably one of the toughest roles to get right.
sentences.chinese: 業務分析人員可能是最難得到正確認識的一個角色。

sentences.english: It is a rare chance for us to get together.
sentences.chinese: 難得我們有機會聚在一起。

sentences.english: I highly treasure the preceding manis precious precise exercise.
sentences.chinese: 我高度賞玩後面那私人難得的正確演練。

sentences.english: And their home, also resembling is boudoir beauty, see inaccessibly .
sentences.chinese: 而他們的家，也像是深閨美人，難得一見。

sentences.english: The successful defection of Lyalin presented MI5 with a unique opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 利亞林叛逃成功使軍情5局得到了一個難得的機會。

sentences.english: We seldom have a holiday. It is out of humanity to make up the fucuking missed lessons.
sentences.chinese: 難得放假，卻讓我們補課補得死去活來，真不人道。

sentences.english: This but is her heartfelt words, afterward rarely being wine, easily and then vomited out.
sentences.chinese: 這卻是她的肺腑之言，難得是酒後，輕易便吐了出來。

sentences.english: Many people think it is more difficult to learn Chinese than to learn English.
sentences.chinese: 許多人認爲學漢語比學英語難得多。

sentences.english: And these opportunities are black swans, which may appear after a long-time wait.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的機會非常難得，而這種機會是等出來的。

sentences.english: Neuer missed a rare opportunity to do something noble in front of millions of people.
sentences.chinese: 諾埃爾在上百萬人面前錯過了一次行道義的難得機會。

sentences.english: The rare view of Cozy-east nursery garden can provide you funs about nature.
sentences.chinese: 這裏難得的生態景觀，將提供您親大自然的樂趣。

sentences.english: You're a wonderful friend, and I treasure you more with every day.
sentences.chinese: 你是一位難得的摯友，我對你的珍重與日俱增。

sentences.english: My sister lives in Alaska, so I only get to see her once in blue moon.
sentences.chinese: 我的姐姐住在阿拉斯加，所以我很難得才見她一面。

definition: rare/not familiar (to the speaker)/sth rarely experience/hard to see
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to feel happy/to rejoice/to have a great time/to make fun of sb
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
